display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=mKW8diff1P8Q7kNvwFj9cb1&_nc_oc=Adn_MaMPsfWU2_Z7XHaJM-UMz9HIlIsU34xMWSujN1Wui8kz0CEQEDaWvMX784vAxrs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2_Ak4cCD0iG9LNsDHpo3nA&oh=00_AfMSUnvYE6roryf-IYGzWH3Nf30vHjs4HjBYBl2eViFIgw&oe=68527356)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cj7l4GUbZzgQ7kNvwG8U54B&_nc_oc=Adk61mRka2Wz94uqFL7LPzB8B8DOii6Oglel9Z-cMYf_LH2hHy-PEjNBZRDKdccoY-Y&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2_Ak4cCD0iG9LNsDHpo3nA&oh=00_AfPkKO700D32JRD8QcvQw8_nfeVTj2_IcMBYEyNNdcnM9A&oe=68527F6C)



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=x8gwwmPzuXIQ7kNvwE6bk0W&_nc_oc=AdkkVhvxM1-YMSBmZv9wuEhPKhG7mbQ1gcmrNXE15L12neB8i_crBNVu2AIiB4D9R88&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2_Ak4cCD0iG9LNsDHpo3nA&oh=00_AfOy7Ku2vkHnaiF1f-QSR1y5-VmdTSoxzlcRU_asi-0HXQ&oe=68526AF2)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=xdmXSIEVXfMQ7kNvwFS9f0-&_nc_oc=AdnvgmV9JZ3IhvylP1U5US4hUOZc0w_8dHNSiFNlfVdLBoxddSkXeTfkl58PlaKWRlk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=2_Ak4cCD0iG9LNsDHpo3nA&oh=00_AfMIvKUMUPimOUyBSxjVW3NnXl7FbYd3gqIZqVb06wZn-A&oe=68526D0C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
